unnormalised: For your shaadi, remember to book the venue at least 6 months in advance, ideally by 01/01/2025 for a wedding in July '25; also confirm the caterers before 15/02/2025 to avoid last-minute chaos!
normalised: For your shaadi, remember to book the venue at least six months in advance, ideally by first january two thousand and twenty five for a wedding in July two thousand and twenty five; also confirm the caterers before fifteenth february two thousand and twenty five to avoid last-minute chaos!
